title: The taboo secret to better health
description: Our poop and pee have superpowers, but for the most part we don't harness them. Molly Winter faces down our squeamishness and asks us to see what goes down the toilet as a resource, one that can help fight climate change, spur innovation and even save us money.
author: Molly Winter
keywords: TED, talks, activism, agriculture, community, alternative energy, design, climate change, energy, engineering, environment, food, green, farming, health, humanity, infrastructure, natural resources, sanitation, nature, TEDx, water
